# Infrastructure

<div style="margin-bottom: 4rem;"></div>

**The infrastructure of the Laboratory for Nanofunctional and Nanocomposite Materials 
at NCSR “Demokritos” includes synthesis and characterization facilities such as:**

    •	Tube, muffle and microwave furnaces<br>
    •	Ultrasonication bath and tip devices<br> 
    •	Freeze drying equipment<br>
    •	InVia Reflex Micro RAMAN spectrometer<br>
    •	Fourier Transform Infrared Spectrophotometer<br> 
    •	UV-Vis spectrophotometer<br>
    •	Photoluminescence spectrometer<br>
    •	Metrohm Autolab electrochemistry equipment<br>
    •	GLOVEBOX Braun Labmaster for labor under controlled conditions, etc.

<div style="margin-bottom: 3rem;"></div>

**There is also access to:**

    •	X-ray Diffractometer equipment<br>
    •	Atomic Force Microscopy equipment<br> 
    •	Transmission Electron Microscope<br>
    •	Scanning Electron Microscope<br>
    •	X-ray Photoelectron Spectroscopy<br>
    •	Electron Paramagnetic Resonance Spectroscopy<br>
    •	Dynamic Light Scattering equipment<br>
    •	Solid State Nuclear Magnetic Resonance spectroscopy, etc.
